image.alt_text: Photo by Saint Timileyin on November 05, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Nobody in the Bible had a seminary degree. Never confuse information with the Spirit's guidance. You are enough, exactly as you are, Christian. Now grow. Matt McMillen Ministries'.
image.caption:

image.alt_text: Photo by tj🤍🎀💙🌸 in Read the Caption. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'Forgiveness may not automatically result in Reconciliation. But Reconciliation should always be the Goal. _shewrites_herstory'.
image.caption:
Matthew 18:21, 22. Then Peter came up and said to him, "Lord, how often shall my brother sin against me, and I forgive him? As many as seven times?" Jesus said to him, "I do not say to you seven times, but seventy times seven."
#forgiveness #reconciliation #goal #relationshipgoals #love #life #lifeverse #bible #peace

image.alt_text: Photo by Reclaimed Ministry on January 04, 2022. May be an image of text that says 'God designed marriage to be a partnership with each other. You were created to be a team. @reclaimedministry'.
image.caption:
I sometimes wonder what type of advice our married selves would tell the younger, engaged kids 19+ years ago? Would the excitement of marriage cause us to stay if we knew about the hard that was to come? Did we really understand marriage to be a team sport?⠀
⠀
There are so many things I wished we did differently.⠀
⠀
* I wished we protected each other more; boundaries.⠀⠀⠀
* I wished we invested more into our marriage; spoke more of our love languages.⠀
* I wished we loved better; passion.⠀
* I wished we slowed down; less race, more grace.⠀
* I wished we were more safe with each other; communication.⠀
* I wished we understood better; listened.⠀
* I wished we played more; laughter.⠀
⠀
Creating a marriage that is safe, affirming and has an understanding that boundaries are not discipline, would have spared many tears and brokenness.⠀
⠀
But God...⠀
⠀
He gave us a second chance. He forgave us so that we could forgive each other.⠀
⠀
What would you tell your young self?⠀
.⠀
.⠀
.⠀
#lookingback #relationshipadvice #reflection #newlyweds💍 #justmarried❤️ #4kidslater #boundaries #lovelanguage #passion #graceupongrace #communication #butgod #forgiveness #betrayaltrauma #infidelity #restoration #hopeandhealing #marriagestory #marriagetoday #marriage #reconciliation #igotyoubabe #hehasmyback #wereinthistogether #youandme #teamwork #reclaimedbook #reclaimedministry

image.alt_text: Photo by Elisheva Liss on December 11, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'Elisheva Liss @LissElisheva It's widely understood that "I'm sorry you feel that way" isn't really an apology. Which means that: 1. if someone says it, they're not remorseful and 2. you can use it too, when being criticized for something you don't fee is wrong.'.
image.caption:
What can be an insincere apology in one case, can be a conflict-diffusing boundary in another. 

Context makes a big difference. ❤️

Edited to explain: 

“I’m sorry you feel they way” is not a remorseful apology, so if the circumstances call for taking responsibility, empathy, and regret, this will ring hollow. 

By the same token, if you are being irrationally attacked, falsely accused, or harassed by someone toxic or with whom you don’t want to engage, saying “I’m sorry you feel that way,” conveys the message that you don’t agree with their perspective and aren’t interested in a circuitous, rabbit hole debate. It’s a boundary.

image.alt_text: Photo by Helga West on January 03, 2022. May be an image of text that says 'Spiritual destruction renewal and Guided by the Canadian truth and reconciliation process, the church has largely focused on documenting historical wrongs. But West says it has not yet come to terms with how it has forever transformed Sámi spirituality. "Christianity in general brought this hierarchical and linear view of the world that was very different from the Sámi cosmic vision, that was pluralistic," she said. "They were forced to think differently of the world, of their ancestors, of their practices, that were labelled as pagan and backward." @CBCNEWS'.
image.caption:
The Sámi reconciliation processes in the Nordics have started to gain a lot of international attention. It's a positive sign of people wanting to learn more about Indigenous realities.

🔹️

In the Nordic countries of Norway, Sweden and Finland, there are two kinds of Sámi reconciliation processes going on right now.

The church run processes between the Sámi and Lutheran churches started roughly in the 1980s. The state run truth and reconciliation processes with the Sámi started in 2016 in Norway and Finland and recently in Sweden as well.

🔹️

In addition to these three Nordic countries, Sámi people live in a region called Russia.

🔹️

I'm not involved in these reconciliation processes, but I analyze them in my doctoral thesis. In my work, I listen to what my people think of reconciliation and on the other hand, how churches and states argue for reconciliation.

🔹️

If you're interested, here are some recent journalistic articles published about these processes.

My comments about the Sámi spirituality and Christianity are found in the article by @cbcnews .
.
.
.
#reconciliation #saamipeople #indigenous #spirituality #christianity #colonialism #phdlife #universityofhelsinki

image.alt_text: Photo by Steph Leopard on December 29, 2021. May be an image of text.
image.caption:
I asked what 2022 had in store and I got smacked in the face with a whole lot of 2’s 🤣

While there are wonderful themes here of peace, love, balance, harmony and connecting more closely to your inner guidance, reconciling polarities feeds in very strongly too, reinforced by 2022 being the year of The Lovers in Tarot (because 2 + 0 + 2 + 2 = 6 signifying The Lovers). 

We need to come together - to move beyond our differences and recognise and celebrate that which connects us all. To take a stand against the “with us or against us” mentality that we are subject to on so many fronts on a daily basis and accept all aspects of ourselves so that we can truly make inroads in the spiritual evolution of humanity.

I was meditating a few days ago on the yin yang symbol ☯️ - here, we see the ever-changing nature of light and shade, also showing us that there is dark in the light and light in the dark. If we attempt to cut the dark from the light or vice versa, we simply cut off an aspect of divinity, and further remove ourselves from source. The yin yang is a wonderful symbol to teach and remind us that change is fundamental in life and that light and shade belong in balance. 

Let’s choose to shine this perspective brightly in 2022 for the highest good.

#tarot #thothtarot #twoofcups #twoofswords #thehighpriestess #leopardtarot #peace #love #balance #harmony #intuition #spiritualevolution #humanity #reconciliation #polarities #duality #choice #highestgood #divine #source #yinyang #change #light #shade #dark #shadowwork #lightworker #growth #wisdom #spirit

image.alt_text: Photo by L’auracle - Laura on January 09, 2022. May be an image of text.
image.caption:
✨Énergies du jour✨
✨9 Janvier 2022 ✨
Avec le 10 d'Air on vous parle de fin des souffrances, fin d'une période difficile
Avec le Boomerang on vous parle d'un retour, d'une réconciliation
Avec le 8 de Bâtons on vous parle de communication, de confrontation
Avec le Pendu on vous parle d'un blocage, d'un attachement
Pour aujourd'hui il y a des énergies de fin des souffrances, c'est la fin d'un cycle, la fin d'une période difficile, la souffrance s'en va parce que vous vous réconciliez avec quelqu'un, que ce soit au niveau sentimental ou autre relationnel, quelqu'un revient vers l'autre, ou vous n'espérez plus, il y a communication et confrontation, mais la situation reste bloquée, ou bien vous acceptez le blocage avec résilience, dans tous les cas vous restez attaché à cette personne
Le conseil pour aujourd'hui c'est donc : de mettre fin à la souffrance, d'en terminer avec une situation douloureuse, de revenir vers quelqu'un ou de ne plus espérer, de se réconcilier, de communiquer, de se confronter, ou de rester bloqué et de s'attendre à rester bloqué et attaché
+ Flammes Jumelles : l'Avancement sur le Parcours et le Pape... vous avancez sur le parcours dans ce contrat d'âme, pour un engagement, certains avancent autour de la communication, d'autres restent bloqué à cause d'un engagement à côté
+ Part Masculine Joyeuse : on a passé une très belle journée, on vit de belles choses grâce à l'autre, ou c'est faux et on souffre ?
+ Part Féminine Abandonnée : on se sent abandonnée, on a peur que l'autre ne revienne jamais, ou on n'espère plus un retour ?
+ 10 + 8 + 12 + 7 + 54 + 22 + 77 = 190 = 19... le Soleil, le bonheur, la clarté
Belle journée ☀️
•
•
Retrouvez ce tirage chaque matin sur ma chaîne YouTube L’auracle 🎥☺️
•
•

image.alt_text: Photo by RAKHI BEEKRUM | PSYCHOLOGIST in Rakhi Beekrum - Psychologist. May be an image of text that says 'What does Reconciliation Entail? forgiveness effort from both parties a sincere apology accountability for the wrong- doing true remorse changed behavior @rakhibeekrum'.
image.caption:
Today South Africans commemorate Day of Reconciliation 🇿🇦

Reconciliation of relationships requires the presence of certain elements. Firstly, there needs to be forgiveness from the party that was hurt. Forgiveness does not mean that you condone the wrong-doing -it means that you choose not to hold on to it any longer.

Reconciliation is only possible if both parties are willing and prepared to put in the effort to rebuild trust. The offending party needs to show true remorse & apologize - not just verbally, but through changed behaviour. Reconciliation is a process. It takes time to rebuild trust. 

There are instances where reconciliation is not possible -or healthy. This might be when the hurt was so bad that one can forgive but chooses not to rebuild a relationship. This is okay. Reconciliation is also not possibly when there is no true remorse or accountability. It is not possible to just move forward without this.

When deciding whether to reconcile or not, think about what will bring you the most peace ☮️

.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
. 

#rakhibeekrum #psychologist

_____________________________________________

#dayofreconciliation #reconciliation #durban #durbannorth #southafrica #umhlanga #psychologistsofinstagram #psychologistsouthafrica #therapistsofinstagram #proudlysouthafrican #southafricanhistory #forgivenessisfreedom #nationbuilding #brokenrelationships #trustissues #seekforgiveness #changedbehavior

image.alt_text: Photo by Saint Timileyin on November 13, 2021. May be an image of one or more people and text that says 'Lauran Robinson @lauranlou365 If your husband loves long hair, wear it long. If he loves you in a dress, wear a dress. Hate me all day, out you will never convince me that I'm wrong for telling women to love their husbands enough to say "I care what you think" and desiring to be attractive for their spouse.'.
image.caption:
And If He Prefers And Loves Ur Natural Look, STOP Ruining Ur Face With Make-up Either. More Than Half The Time Women Look Nothing Like They Paint Themselves Up To Be. That's One Of The Reasons Women Bring Unnecessary Problems Into Their Lives Attracting Pigs Instead Of A Man With Genuine, Substantive Motives Or Intentions. And A Man With Genuine Intentions Would Rarely Be Party To A Fake Outlook On Life.

As A Woman Ur Beauty Is For Ur Husbands Eyes Alone. Just Like His Beauty Is All For Ur Eyes Alone. Marriage Cancels Out Every Other Prospects And So It Becomes Benefiting Of Both Man And His Wife To Only Focus On Those Things Which Keep The Flames Of Passion And Desire Burning Between Each Other. 

The Shallow Desire For Multiple Attention Is Always A Breeding Ground For Poorly Influenced Decisions. A Strong And Decisive Mental State Of Mind Is A Quality That Must Be Developed Even Before Marriage. Cancel Out All The Cheap Noise And Distractions And Focus On Building A Godly Home With Ur Lover. It's Only One Life Too Short To Be Lived For Vanity And In Confusion.

#Word2DWise
